agent_loan.title: Please understand that agents cannot apply for loan.

policy holder_loan.title:
You can apply for loan against policy after 3 years completed from the date of commencement of the policy. Maximum eligible loan is 90% of surrender value.
For more information, please contact the nearest local branch.

loan.title: Agents are not eligible to apply for loans. Policyholders who want a loan should contact their nearest local branch. You can apply for loan against policy after 3 years completed from the date of commencement of the policy. Maximum eligible loan is 90% of surrender value.
